fields.name: Seize The Means Of Production:
fields.value: Target up to one (or three if your standard deviation was above 27.50%) of the top 3 scorers last evening. Attack your target. If successful, gain a permanent score boost equal to 1/10 of your target's score.

fields.name: More Equal (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Receive a random list of living players based on your score. Rampage attack one with 1.2x attack power.

fields.name: Solidarity Forever! (0x):
fields.value: Gain one ammo for every 6 kills. Convert a lower-scoring player to the Communist Revolutionary role. They keep any Passives of their previous role.

fields.name: Worker's Front (Passive):
fields.value: You have a factional chat with any other Communist Revolutionaries.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: Win when all players, except Communist Revolutionaries, have been eliminated.
